Articles.Content:
A little "mod" I made for Kerbal Space Program. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

100 years ago this month was the Fokker Scourge on the Western Front. I kind of made this Flag pack in the light of that.

I also added aircraft roundels and made transparent versions of each. Goes great with the *Flag Decals Mod* by **StarVision2893** 

Propellers added by *Kerbal Aircraft Expansion* by **imaketheparts**.

KAX: [http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/221780-kerbal-aircraft-expansion-kax](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/221780-kerbal-aircraft-expansion-kax) 

Link: [http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/222813-flag-decals-v2-3](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/222813-flag-decals-v2-3)

Link to My Flag Pack: [http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/232520-kerbal-world-war-flags](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/232520-kerbal-world-war-flags)

Some images of me using them.

I don't own any of the images on the flags. The images belong to their respective owners. I simply resized them.

Hope everyone enjoys!

![11700919_905151892883200_1116292526769815038_n.jpg?oh=411d42bf1960e66d86b361a55d4cfc35&oe=5616D553](https://scontent-dfw1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xtp1/v/t1.0-9/s720x720/11700919_905151892883200_1116292526769815038_n.jpg?oh=411d42bf1960e66d86b361a55d4cfc35&oe=5616D553)

![11667497_905151749549881_2299936234585899988_n.jpg?oh=7daa17b3adb8f8bdd302fa8e400fffdc&oe=560E333A](https://scontent-dfw1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xap1/v/t1.0-9/s720x720/11667497_905151749549881_2299936234585899988_n.jpg?oh=7daa17b3adb8f8bdd302fa8e400fffdc&oe=560E333A)

![11377339_903770159688040_8670248420270065841_n.jpg?oh=9d9d3ec10aa76875929fb10ae51fc2bc&oe=562168FC](https://scontent-dfw1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xap1/v/t1.0-9/s720x720/11377339_903770159688040_8670248420270065841_n.jpg?oh=9d9d3ec10aa76875929fb10ae51fc2bc&oe=562168FC)

This looks useful! I'm big on my war planes so this should be a treat!

Have some rep!
